nodes.text: Mako was an elderly Quarren male that lived in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu. When Julen Rakab's speeder malfunctioned, Mako offered assistance in pushing the vehicle to Salju's Black Spire Station, but Rakab declined.
Mako appeared in A Crash of Fate, a 2019 young-adult novel written by Zoraida Córdova.
